detailsData.title: Engaged Community
detailsData.content: The Articulate Fly cultivates and serves a community of engaged fly anglers who dig a little deeper. We respect our listeners and reward those who meaningfully engage with our community.

detailsData.title: Affluent Demographic
detailsData.content: The fly fishing community is an affluent, well-educated demographic. 50% of fly fishers earn $75,000 or more per year, and 43% hold college or post-graduate degrees.

detailsData.title: Impactful Medium
detailsData.content: Podcasting is a highly efficient, impactful medium. 98M Americans listened to a podcast in the last week, and 52% of monthly podcast consumers have annual incomes in excess of $75,000.

detailsData.title: Steadily Growing
detailsData.content: The Articulate Fly launched in Fall 2018 and has enjoyed a steadily growing and engaged listenership. Our guests include national personalities and regional personalities of interest to various anglers.

subHeading: Educational Podcasts and Articles for Anglers and the Southeastern Fly Fishing Community
valueProp: The Articulate Fly cultivates and serves a community of engaged fly anglers who dig a little deeper, enjoy the story behind the story and want a more complete experience on the water. Our approach to community is 100% organic. We don't buy listeners or followers on social media. We don't hack our listeners' attention. We respect them too much.

testimonalData.text: Marvin brings a fresh insight to the sport of fly fishing with his understanding and knowledge of its deep history.
testimonalData.author: Blane Chocklett

testimonalData.text: Marvin Cash has paved the way for anglers to tell their story in his Articulate Fly podcast.
testimonalData.author: Landon Mayer

testimonalData.text: Our results have been nothing but positive, and we will continue to work with Marvin for years to come.
testimonalData.author: Tim O’Neill
